overview: A prequel to Oh! Sendang. Mang Nano is a wily, scheming but lovable swindler who concocts the most ingenuous scams to finance his little vices, like jueteng or cockfighting. Bitoy, his overgrown child, unwittingly exposes the scams perennially getting his father into trouble with Aling Rosa.
title: Nukso Nang Nukso
